Title: The Godfather
Quote: I'm gonna make him an offer he can't refuse.
Description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

MovieCards.Title: Card 1
MovieCards.Description: A classic crime film.

InterestingFacts.FactText: The Godfather was the highest-grossing film of 1972.
Marlon Brando refused to accept his Academy Award for Best Actor.

Title: Бэтмен
Quote: Я - возмездие. Я - ночь. Я - Бэтмен.
Description: Брюс Уэйн, миллиардер и плейбой, ночью становится Бэтменом, защитником Готэм-сити от преступности.

MovieCards.Title: Бэтмен: Возвращение
MovieCards.Description: Бэтмен возвращается, чтобы сразиться с Пингвином и Женщиной-кошкой.

MovieCards.Title: Бэтмен: Начало
MovieCards.Description: Происхождение Бэтмена и его превращение в защитника Готэм-сити.

InterestingFacts.FactText: Бэтмобиль в фильме был создан на основе Chevrolet Camaro 1969 года.
Загадки, которые Загадочник загадывает Бэтмену, основаны на реальных загадках из комиксов о Бэтмене.

Title: Властелин колец: Братство кольца
Description: Фродо Бэггинс, совсем не ведомый далеким странствиям, становится обладателем Всемогущего Кольца. С помощью Гэндальфа и других друзей, он отправляется на поиски таинственной Горы Одно Кольцо, чтобы уничтожить его и спасти Средиземье.

MovieCards.Title: Плакат
MovieCards.Description: Приключенческая сага, взявшая начало от великолепной книги Дж. Р. Р. Толкина.

MovieCards.Title: Афиша

InterestingFacts.FactText: Съемки фильма составили более 450 дней.
Фильм завоевал 4 премии Оскар.

Title: Интерстеллар
Description: В не очень удаленном будущем человечество сталкивается с катастрофическим изменением климата. Чтобы спасти человеческую расу, команда астронавтов отправляется в космос на поиски нового дома для человечества.

MovieCards.Title: Плакат

Саундтрек к фильму был написан известным композитором Хансом Циммером.

Title: The Green Mile
Quote: At the end of every dark tunnel, there's a light waiting.
Description: Set in 1935, in an American prison called 'Cold Mountain,' the story revolves around Paul Edgecomb, a corrections officer who encounters John Coffey, a mysterious inmate with extraordinary abilities.

MovieCards.Title: Poster

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Dive into the world of mystery and fantasy with this film.

InterestingFacts.FactText: The Green Mile is based on a novel by Stephen King.
The film received four Academy Award nominations.

Title: The Matrix
Quote: Understand, young man, that you don't choose the Matrix. The Matrix chooses you.
Description: Thomas Anderson, also known as Neo, discovers that his reality is a computer program created by machines to keep humans under control. He joins a group of rebels to free humanity from the illusion and confront the machines.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: An amazing sci-fi action thriller.

MovieCards.Description: Unravel the mysteries of the Matrix.

InterestingFacts.FactText: The Matrix was originally conceived as a comic book.
Keanu Reeves underwent extensive training in martial arts for his role.

Title: The Karate Kid
Quote: Life will knock us down, but we can choose whether or not to get back up.
Description: When 12-year-old Dre Parker moves to China, he faces bullies at his new school. With the help of maintenance man Mr. Han, Dre learns kung fu to stand up to his tormentors.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: A heartwarming tale of friendship and perseverance.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Join Dre on his journey to master kung fu and overcome adversity.

InterestingFacts.FactText: Jaden Smith underwent months of intensive martial arts training for his role.
Jackie Chan did most of his own stunts in the film.

Title: The Accountant
Quote: Math is the language of the universe.
Description: Christian Wolff, a math savant with high-functioning autism, works as a forensic accountant for criminal organizations. As he uncooks the books for a new client, he becomes the target of both the Treasury Department and dangerous assassins.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: A gripping thriller that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Discover the hidden secrets behind Christian Wolff's extraordinary skills.

InterestingFacts.FactText: Ben Affleck underwent rigorous training in martial arts and firearms for his role.
The character of Christian Wolff is inspired by real-life individuals with autism who excel in mathematics.

Title: The Host
Quote: You will be one of us.
Description: When an unseen enemy threatens mankind by taking over their bodies and erasing their memories, Melanie Stryder risks everything to protect the people she cares about.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: A thrilling tale of survival in a world overtaken by an alien threat.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Join Melanie on her journey to save humanity from extinction.

InterestingFacts.FactText: The Host is based on the novel of the same name by Stephenie Meyer.
Saoirse Ronan had to wear colored contact lenses to match her character's eye color with the book's description.

Title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
Description: An aging Chinese immigrant is swept up in an insane adventure where she alone can save the world by exploring other universes connecting with the lives she could have led.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: An exhilarating journey through multiple dimensions.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Experience the chaos and wonder of parallel universes.

InterestingFacts.FactText: Michelle Yeoh learned basic Mandarin for her role as Evelyn Wang.
The film features over 100 different versions of Michelle Yeoh's character.

Title: Kick-Ass
Quote: With no power comes no responsibility.
Description: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a superhero, even though he has no powers, training, or meaningful reason to do so.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: A hilarious take on the superhero genre.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Join Kick-Ass and Hit-Girl in their crusade against crime.

InterestingFacts.FactText: Chloë Grace Moretz trained with a Navy SEAL for her role as Hit-Girl.
Nicolas Cage based his portrayal of Big Daddy on Adam West's Batman.

Title: Asterix: The Secret of the Magic Potion
Quote: A potion to make all men equal.
Description: Following a fall during mistletoe picking, Druid Getafix decides that it is time to secure the future of the village. Accompanied by Asterix and Obelix, he undertakes to travel the Gallic world in search of a talented young druid to transmit the Secret of the Magic Potion.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Join Asterix and Obelix on another hilarious adventure.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Discover the secrets of the magic potion.

InterestingFacts.FactText: The film is based on the comic book 'Asterix and the Secret of the Magic Potion' by René Goscinny and Albert Uderzo.
The character Dogmatix (Ideafix) is animated with more detail and expression than in previous films.

Title: The Snow Queen
Quote: A heartwarming tale of friendship and bravery.
Description: A powerful king nearly lost his family due to the Snow Queen's evil deeds. He finds a way to ban all the magic from the world - all the possessors of magic powers are now trapped in Mirrorlands. The only one who can stop him and keep the fairy-tale in our world is Gerda - as her own biggest power is not magic but her faith in kindness and friendship. In Gerda's new adventures, she will be helped by trolls, pirates and even the Snow Queen herself.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Enter the enchanting world of The Snow Queen.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Join Gerda on her journey to save her friend from the Snow Queen's icy grasp.

InterestingFacts.FactText: The Snow Queen is based on the fairy tale of the same name by Hans Christian Andersen.
The film was a box office success in Russia and received positive reviews for its animation and storytelling.

Title: Don Quixote
Description: An aging man sets out on a quest to revive chivalry and undo wrongs as he sees them, accompanied by his faithful squire.
ProductionCompany: Tornasol Films, Recorded Picture Company (RPC), Eurimages

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Embark on a whimsical journey with Don Quixote and his loyal squire.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Experience the magic of Terry Gilliam's adaptation of the classic tale.

InterestingFacts.FactText: The film faced numerous production setbacks and was famously plagued by issues, including the documentary 'Lost in La Mancha' detailing its troubled production.
Johnny Depp was originally cast as Toby Grisoni but later took on a smaller role due to production delays.

Title: The Legend of the Green Knight
Quote: Embark on a journey of honor and chivalry.
Description: In this epic tale inspired by Arthurian legend, a young knight, Gawain, accepts a challenge from the mystical Green Knight. Bound by honor, Gawain sets out on a perilous journey to confront the Green Knight and prove his worth. Along the way, he encounters treacherous foes, tests of his courage, and the true meaning of chivalry. Will Gawain emerge victorious, or will the forces of darkness prevail?

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Experience the grandeur of The Legend of the Green Knight.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Join Gawain on his quest for honor and glory.

InterestingFacts.FactText: The Green Knight is a character from Arthurian legend, first appearing in the 14th-century poem 'Sir Gawain and the Green Knight.'
Director David Lowery aimed to create a visually stunning and thematically rich interpretation of the classic tale.

Title: Men in Black: International
Description: Agent H and Agent M are part of a top-secret organization that polices extraterrestrial affairs on Earth. As they uncover a mole in the organization, they embark on a globe-trotting adventure to save the world from a new alien threat.
ProductionCompany: Columbia Pictures, Amblin Entertainment, Parkes+MacDonald Image Nation

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Join Agent H and Agent M on an intergalactic adventure.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Discover the secrets of the Men in Black in this thrilling installment.

InterestingFacts.FactText: This film serves as a spin-off and sequel to the original 'Men in Black' film series.
The character of Agent M was originally written as a male, but was changed to a female character during development.

Title: Dune
Description: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and his people. As malevolent forces explode into conflict over the planet's exclusive supply of the most precious resource in existence—a commodity capable of unlocking humanity's greatest potential—only those who can conquer their fear will survive.
Country: USA, Canada, Hungary, United Arab Emirates, Norway

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Journey to the desert planet of Arrakis in 'Dune.'

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Experience the epic tale of betrayal, love, and redemption.

InterestingFacts.FactText: The film is based on the 1965 novel of the same name by Frank Herbert.
Denis Villeneuve described 'Dune' as 'Star Wars for adults.'

Title: Mud
Description: Two boys encounter a fugitive and form a pact to help him evade the bounty hunters on his trail and to reunite him with his true love.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Explore the depths of friendship and loyalty in 'Mud.'

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Join two boys on an unforgettable adventure with a mysterious fugitive.

InterestingFacts.FactText: The character of Mud is inspired by director Jeff Nichols' own experiences growing up in the South.
Matthew McConaughey prepared for his role by losing weight and growing a beard to reflect the character's rugged lifestyle.

Title: Jeepers Creepers
Description: A brother and sister driving home through isolated countryside for spring break encounter a flesh-eating creature which is in the midst of its ritualistic eating spree.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Experience the terror of 'Jeepers Creepers' as a brother and sister encounter a horrifying creature on a desolate road.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Join Trish and Darry on their harrowing journey as they face the terror of the flesh-eating Creeper.

InterestingFacts.FactText: The film's director, Victor Salva, drew inspiration from a childhood nightmare for the character of the Creeper.
Despite mixed reviews, 'Jeepers Creepers' was a commercial success, spawning two sequels.

Title: Hereditary
Quote: Every family tree hides a secret.
Description: After the death of her secretive grandmother, a family begins to unravel cryptic and increasingly terrifying secrets about their ancestry.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Unravel the horrifying secrets of the Graham family in 'Hereditary' as they confront their dark and mysterious ancestry.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Experience the chilling tale of 'Hereditary' and delve into the depths of familial horror.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Hereditary' marks Ari Aster's feature film directorial debut, earning critical acclaim for its unsettling atmosphere and powerful performances.
The film's shocking moments and intricate storytelling have made it a standout in the horror genre, prompting discussions and analysis among viewers.

Title: You're Next
Quote: Home is where the hunt is.
Description: When the Davison family comes under attack during their wedding anniversary getaway, the gang of mysterious killers soon learns that one of the victims harbors a secret talent for fighting back.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Prepare for a thrilling battle for survival as the Davison family fights back against masked assailants in 'You're Next!'

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Experience the tension and terror as Erin proves to be an unexpected force to be reckoned with in 'You're Next!'

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'You're Next!' received praise for its clever subversion of home invasion tropes and its strong, resourceful female lead.
The film was shot in chronological order, allowing the actors to experience the escalating tension of the story in real time.

Title: Spider-Man: Homecoming
Quote: Homework can wait. The city can't.
Description: Peter Parker balances his life as an ordinary high school student in Queens with his superhero alter-ego Spider-Man, and finds himself on the trail of a new menace prowling the skies of New York City.
ProductionCompany: Marvel Studios, Columbia Pictures, Pascal Pictures

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Swing into action with 'Spider-Man: Homecoming' as Peter Parker faces off against the menacing Vulture.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Spider-Man: Homecoming' is the first solo Spider-Man film set within the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU).
Tom Holland, who portrays Spider-Man, was only 19 years old when he was cast in the role.

Title: Demon Slayer: Mugen Train
Description: Tanjiro Kamado and his friends from the Demon Slayer Corps accompany the Flame Hashira, Kyojuro Rengoku, on a mission aboard the Mugen Train to investigate a series of mysterious disappearances.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Embark on a thrilling journey aboard the Mugen Train with Tanjiro and his companions in 'Demon Slayer: Mugen Train.'

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Demon Slayer: Mugen Train' is a direct continuation of the anime series 'Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba.'
The film broke numerous box office records in Japan, becoming the highest-grossing film of all time in the country.

Title: Pirates of the Caribbean: Dead Men Tell No Tales
Quote: The dead have taken command of the sea.
Description: Captain Jack Sparrow searches for the Trident of Poseidon while being pursued by an undead sea captain and his crew.

MovieCards.Title: Poster

InterestingFacts.FactText: This film is the fifth installment in the 'Pirates of the Caribbean' film series and serves as a soft reboot of the franchise.
Javier Bardem's portrayal of Captain Armando Salazar received praise for its menacing presence and visual effects.

Title: Ivan Tsarevich and the Grey Wolf 4
Description: Ivan Tsarevich, the Firebird, and the Gray Wolf embark on a new adventure to save Princess Vasilisa, who has been kidnapped by the evil Baba Yaga.

InterestingFacts.FactText: This animated film is the fourth installment in the 'Ivan Tsarevich' series and continues the adventures of the beloved characters.
The film incorporates elements of Russian folklore and fairy tales, making it popular among audiences of all ages.

Title: Venom
Description: Journalist Eddie Brock discovers the symbiotic alien Venom and acquires superhuman abilities. Together, they must confront the sinister inventor Carlton Drake, who seeks to exploit the alien symbiotes for his own gain.
ProductionCompany: Columbia Pictures, Marvel Entertainment, Tencent Pictures

MovieCards.Description: Embrace your inner anti-hero with 'Venom.'

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Witness the symbiotic bond between man and alien.

InterestingFacts.FactText: Venom made his first appearance in the comic book 'The Amazing Spider-Man #300' in 1988.
Tom Hardy, known for his intense method acting, spent months preparing for the role both physically and psychologically.

Title: Venom 2
Description: Journalist Eddie Brock discovers the symbiotic alien Venom and acquires superhuman abilities. Together, they must confront the sinister inventor Carlton Drake, who seeks to exploit the alien symbiotes for his own gain.

Tom Hardy, known for his intense method acting, spent months preparing for the role both physically and psychologically.

Title: Ant-Man
Description: Scott Lang, a master thief, must embrace his inner hero and help his mentor, Dr. Hank Pym, protect the Ant-Man suit from falling into the wrong hands. With the ability to shrink in size but increase in strength, Lang must pull off a heist that will save the world.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Get ready for a pint-sized adventure in 'Ant-Man.'

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Witness the incredible shrinking hero in action.

InterestingFacts.FactText: Before Paul Rudd was cast as Ant-Man, other actors considered for the role included Joseph Gordon-Levitt and Simon Pegg.
The character of Ant-Man first appeared in 'Tales to Astonish #27' in 1962.

Title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic
Description: Follow the adventures of Twilight Sparkle and her friends as they learn about the magic of friendship and defend the land of Equestria from various threats.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Discover the enchanting world of Equestria with 'My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic' and join Twilight Sparkle and her friends on their adventures.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Experience the magic of friendship and the wonders of Equestria in 'My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic.'

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic' gained a significant adult fanbase known as 'bronies,' who appreciated its positive themes and characterization.
The series received critical acclaim for its animation quality, voice acting, and storytelling, becoming a cultural phenomenon beyond its target demographic.

Title: Hunter x Hunter
Quote: The journey to become a Hunter.
Description: Gon Freecss, a young boy, aspires to become a Hunter, an elite class of adventurers capable of tackling dangerous tasks and discovering hidden treasures. Alongside his friends, Gon embarks on a perilous journey to achieve his dream.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Embark on an epic adventure to become a Hunter in 'Hunter x Hunter,' as Gon and his friends brave danger and uncover secrets.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Experience the excitement and challenges of the Hunter Exam alongside Gon and his companions in 'Hunter x Hunter.'

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Hunter x Hunter' is based on the manga series of the same name written by Yoshihiro Togashi, known for its intricate world-building and complex characters.
The series has received widespread acclaim for its compelling storyline, well-developed characters, and exhilarating action sequences, making it a favorite among anime fans.

Title: The Secret World of Arrietty
Quote: Do not be seen by humans. That's been the law of the borrowers for centuries.
Description: Arrietty, a tiny borrower, and her family live hidden beneath the floorboards of a suburban home. When Arrietty is discovered by a human boy named Shawn, their unlikely friendship sets off a series of extraordinary events that will change their lives forever.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Discover 'The Secret World of Arrietty,' where little people live big adventures.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Experience the magic of Studio Ghibli in this enchanting tale of friendship.

InterestingFacts.FactText: The film is based on the novel 'The Borrowers' by Mary Norton.
Composer Cécile Corbel provided the film's enchanting soundtrack, featuring the song 'Arrietty's Song.'

Title: Three Heroes and the Sea King
Description: Three brave warriors - Dobrynya, Alyosha Popovich, and Ilya Muromets - embark on a perilous quest to rescue the kidnapped princess from the clutches of the evil Sea King. Along the way, they encounter mythical creatures, daunting challenges, and test the limits of their courage and friendship.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Join the Three Heroes on a swashbuckling adventure to save the day.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Experience the excitement of Russian folklore in 'Three Heroes and the Sea King.'

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Three Heroes and the Sea King' is part of the popular Russian animated film franchise 'Three Heroes,' based on Slavic folklore.
The film features stunning animation and imaginative character designs that bring Russian legends to life.

Title: Sandman
Description: Based on Neil Gaiman's groundbreaking comic book series, 'Sandman' follows Dream, also known as Morpheus, the Lord of Dreams, as he navigates the realm of dreams and encounters various mythical beings.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Explore the captivating world of dreams and mythology with 'Sandman,' as Dream embarks on a journey through the realms of imagination.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Experience the enchanting and surreal tales of 'Sandman' as Dream navigates the boundaries between reality and the subconscious.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Sandman' has been in development as a television series for many years, with Netflix finally announcing its production in 2019.
Neil Gaiman, the creator of 'Sandman,' is actively involved in the adaptation, ensuring that the essence of the beloved comic series is faithfully translated to the screen.

Title: Midnight Mass
Description: The arrival of a charismatic priest to a small island community coincides with the emergence of mysterious events and unsettling phenomena, leading to a clash between faith and reason.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Witness the chilling events unfold in 'Midnight Mass,' as a community grapples with faith, miracles, and horrors beyond comprehension.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Experience the gripping tale of 'Midnight Mass' and delve into the depths of human belief and the unknown.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Midnight Mass' is the latest collaboration between creator Mike Flanagan and Netflix, known for their successful horror series such as 'The Haunting of Hill House.'
The series explores themes of faith, guilt, and redemption, while delivering supernatural scares and thought-provoking storytelling.

Title: Rick and Morty
Description: Follow the interdimensional adventures of an eccentric and alcoholic scientist named Rick Sanchez and his good-hearted but easily influenced grandson Morty Smith.
ProductionCompany: Williams Street, Harmonious Claptrap, Justin Roiland's Solo Vanity Card Productions

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Join Rick and Morty on their hilarious and mind-bending adventures across the multiverse in 'Rick and Morty.'

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Prepare for laughter, chaos, and existential crises with 'Rick and Morty' as they traverse dimensions and challenge reality itself.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Rick and Morty' is created by Justin Roiland and Dan Harmon, known for its dark humor, complex plots, and exploration of existential themes.
The series has gained a dedicated fanbase and critical acclaim for its creativity, wit, and willingness to push the boundaries of animation.

Title: Lucifer
Description: Lucifer Morningstar, bored and unhappy as the Lord of Hell, resigns his throne and abandons his kingdom for Los Angeles, where he indulges in his newfound passion for helping others and running a nightclub.
ProductionCompany: Jerry Bruckheimer Television, DC Entertainment, Warner Bros. Television

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Indulge in the devilishly delightful adventures of 'Lucifer' as he navigates the complexities of life in Los Angeles.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Experience the charm, wit, and intrigue of 'Lucifer' as he teams up with Detective Chloe Decker to solve crimes and dispense justice.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Lucifer' is based on the DC Comics character created by Neil Gaiman, Sam Kieth, and Mike Dringenberg.
Despite its cancellation by Fox after three seasons, 'Lucifer' was revived by Netflix due to fan demand and enjoyed further success with subsequent seasons.

Title: Howls
Quote: Do not be seen by humans. That's been the law of the borrowers for centuries.
Description: Arrietty, a tiny borrower, and her family live hidden beneath the floorboards of a suburban home. When Arrietty is discovered by a human boy named Shawn, their unlikely friendship sets off a series of extraordinary events that will change their lives forever.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Discover 'The Secret World of Arrietty,' where little people live big adventures.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime

InterestingFacts.FactText: The film is based on the novel 'The Borrowers' by Mary Norton.
Composer Cécile Corbel provided the film's enchanting soundtrack, featuring the song 'Arrietty's Song.'

Title: Anne with an E
Quote: Dear old world, you are very lovely, and I am glad to be alive in you.
Description: Follow the adventures of Anne Shirley, an imaginative and spirited orphan, as she navigates the ups and downs of life in the late 19th century. With her vivid imagination and unwavering optimism, Anne touches the hearts of everyone she meets, transforming the lives of those around her.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Embark on a journey to Avonlea with 'Anne with an E.'

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Experience the charm and wonder of Anne's world in this heartwarming series.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Anne with an E' is based on the classic novel 'Anne of Green Gables' by Lucy Maud Montgomery.
The series has garnered praise for its captivating performances and faithful adaptation of the source material.

Title: Mr. Robot
Description: Follow Elliot Alderson, a cybersecurity engineer and hacker, as he becomes involved in the underground hacker group fsociety, led by the mysterious Mr. Robot. Together, they aim to take down corrupt corporations and disrupt the status quo.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Dive into the world of cybercrime and conspiracy with 'Mr. Robot,' as Elliot Alderson navigates a complex web of deceit and manipulation.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Experience the thrilling journey of 'Mr. Robot' as Elliot Alderson battles against powerful adversaries and his own inner demons.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Mr. Robot' received critical acclaim for its realistic portrayal of hacking and cybersecurity, as well as its exploration of themes such as mental health and societal inequality.
The series won multiple awards, including the Golden Globe for Best Television Drama Series, and Rami Malek received an Emmy Award for his performance as Elliot Alderson.

Title: The Miracle Workers
Description: Join a group of low-level angels working in the Department of Answered Prayers as they try to save humanity from destruction by answering a seemingly impossible prayer request.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Experience the heavenly chaos of 'The Miracle Workers' as a group of angels must pull off a miracle to save humanity.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Laugh along with the misadventures of angels and humans in 'The Miracle Workers' as they attempt the impossible to prevent the end of the world.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'The Miracle Workers' is based on the novel 'What in God's Name' by Simon Rich and offers a humorous take on the concept of divine intervention.
The series received praise for its unique premise, clever writing, and standout performances from its cast, particularly Daniel Radcliffe and Steve Buscemi.

Title: Stalker
Description: Follow LAPD detectives as they investigate stalking crimes in Los Angeles, delving into the dark and often dangerous world of obsessive behavior and the victims who are targeted.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Explore the chilling world of stalking and obsession with 'Stalker,' as detectives confront the darkest corners of the human psyche.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Get drawn into the suspense and intrigue of 'Stalker' as LAPD detectives hunt down perpetrators and protect the innocent.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Stalker' was praised for its intense storytelling, gripping suspense, and realistic portrayal of the psychological toll of stalking on both victims and law enforcement.
The series tackled sensitive topics surrounding stalking and provided insight into the methods used by both perpetrators and those trying to stop them.

Title: Stalk
Description: Follow LAPD detectives as they investigate stalking crimes in Los Angeles, delving into the dark and often dangerous world of obsessive behavior and the victims who are targeted.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Explore the chilling world of stalking and obsession with 'Stalker,' as detectives confront the darkest corners of the human psyche.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Get drawn into the suspense and intrigue of 'Stalker' as LAPD detectives hunt down perpetrators and protect the innocent.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Stalker' was praised for its intense storytelling, gripping suspense, and realistic portrayal of the psychological toll of stalking on both victims and law enforcement.
The series tackled sensitive topics surrounding stalking and provided insight into the methods used by both perpetrators and those trying to stop them.

Title: Tom and Jerry
Description: Join the mischievous cat Tom and the clever mouse Jerry in their timeless rivalry filled with slapstick comedy, outrageous chases, and endless pranks. From the classic hand-drawn animation of the 1940s to the colorful adventures of the 1990s, 'Tom and Jerry' has delighted audiences of all ages for generations.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Relive the classic antics of 'Tom and Jerry' in this timeless cartoon series.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Laugh along with the iconic duo as they chase and outsmart each other in every hilarious episode.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Tom and Jerry' is one of the longest-running and most beloved animated series in history.
The series has won multiple Academy Awards for Best Animated Short Film.

Title: Arcane
Description: Set in the utopian city of Piltover and the oppressed underground of Zaun, 'Arcane' follows the intertwined stories of two iconic League of Legends champions, exploring their origins, ambitions, and the power struggles that threaten to tear their world apart.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Immerse yourself in the vibrant world of 'Arcane' as it explores the origins and struggles of beloved League of Legends champions.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Experience the epic tale of 'Arcane' as it delves into the depths of the League of Legends universe, revealing the secrets of Piltover and Zaun.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Arcane' received widespread acclaim for its stunning animation, complex characters, and engaging storyline, earning praise from both fans and critics alike.
The series explores themes of identity, power, and sacrifice, offering a fresh perspective on the lore of League of Legends and its iconic champions.

Title: Money Heist
Description: Follow the mastermind known as The Professor as he recruits a group of uniquely skilled individuals to carry out the biggest heist in recorded history: the robbery of the Royal Mint of Spain. As tensions rise and plans unravel, the robbers find themselves entangled in a thrilling game of cat and mouse with the authorities.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Join The Professor and his team of skilled robbers in 'Money Heist' as they execute a daring plan to rob the Royal Mint of Spain and outwit the authorities.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Experience the adrenaline-fueled thrills of 'Money Heist' as the robbers face off against the police in a high-stakes game of strategy and deception.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Money Heist' became a global phenomenon after being released on Netflix, gaining a massive international fanbase and critical acclaim for its suspenseful storytelling and charismatic characters.
The series was originally intended to be a limited series, but its immense popularity led to the production of additional seasons, extending the story beyond the initial heist.

Title: Gypsy
Description: Therapist Jean Holloway develops dangerous and intimate relationships with the people in her patients' lives, blurring the lines between professional detachment and personal involvement. As Jean's own life begins to unravel, she becomes increasingly entangled in a web of lies and desire.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Delve into the dark and seductive world of 'Gypsy' as therapist Jean Holloway explores the forbidden desires lurking beneath the surface of her seemingly perfect life.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Experience the intoxicating allure of 'Gypsy' as Jean Holloway's professional and personal boundaries blur, leading her down a dangerous path of obsession and deception.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Gypsy' was praised for Naomi Watts' compelling performance and its exploration of complex themes such as identity, desire, and the consequences of betrayal.
Despite its critical acclaim, 'Gypsy' was canceled after one season, leaving many fans disappointed by the unresolved storylines and unanswered questions.

Title: Violet Evergarden
Quote: I will run as fast as I can to wherever my customer desires. I am the Auto Memories Doll, Violet Evergarden.
Description: In the aftermath of a great war, Violet Evergarden, a former soldier trained as a Auto Memories Doll, takes on a new role as a ghostwriter, tasked with transcribing people's thoughts and feelings into letters. Through her work, Violet seeks to understand the meaning of love and emotions, as she grapples with her own past and identity.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Embark on an emotional journey with 'Violet Evergarden' as she learns the true power of words and the depth of human emotions.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Experience the breathtaking beauty and heartfelt stories of 'Violet Evergarden' as she navigates the complexities of love, loss, and redemption.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Violet Evergarden' received critical acclaim for its stunning animation, compelling storytelling, and emotional depth, becoming a beloved series among anime fans worldwide.

The series won numerous awards, including the Best Animation award at the 2019 Crunchyroll Anime Awards, and was praised for its exploration of themes such as trauma, healing, and the power of empathy.

Description: In a post-apocalyptic world, a ragdoll named 9 comes to life and discovers a community of other small creatures like him. Together, they must confront a mechanical threat that aims to destroy them all and uncover the secrets of their existence.
ProductionCompany: Focus Features, Relativity Media, Starz Animation

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Embark on a thrilling adventure with '9' as he leads a group of small creatures in a post-apocalyptic world, fighting against a mechanical menace.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Discover the power of hope and courage in '9' as a ragdoll leads a band of survivors in a battle for survival against overwhelming odds.

InterestingFacts.FactText: '9' is a feature-length expansion of Shane Acker's Academy Award-nominated short film of the same name.
The film received praise for its stunning animation and unique visual style, as well as its exploration of themes such as survival, identity, and the consequences of technology.

Title: Hotel Transylvania
Quote: Where monsters go to get away from it all.
Description: Welcome to Hotel Transylvania, a lavish resort where monsters can relax and be themselves without any human interference. Dracula, the owner, organizes a special party to celebrate his daughter Mavis' 118th birthday, but everything changes when a human stumbles upon the hotel and falls in love with Mavis.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Enter the fantastical world of 'Hotel Transylvania' and join Dracula and his monstrous friends for a hilarious adventure filled with laughs, love, and spooky surprises.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Experience the ultimate monster vacation in 'Hotel Transylvania', where you'll discover that even the scariest monsters need a break from the hustle and bustle of the human world.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Hotel Transylvania' was a commercial success, spawning multiple sequels and spin-offs, as well as a television series, merchandise, and theme park attractions.
The film features an ensemble cast of comedic talents, including Adam Sandler, Andy Samberg, Selena Gomez, and Kevin James, who bring the colorful characters to life with their distinctive voices.

Title: Kung Fu Panda 3
Description: Join Po, the Dragon Warrior, as he faces his biggest challenge yet when a supernatural villain threatens to destroy kung fu and conquer China. With the help of his long-lost father and the Furious Five, Po must train a village of clumsy pandas to become martial arts masters and save the day.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Prepare for the ultimate kung fu showdown in 'Kung Fu Panda 3' as Po teams up with his long-lost father and a village of clumsy pandas to take on a supernatural villain threatening China.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Experience the epic conclusion to the 'Kung Fu Panda' trilogy in 'Kung Fu Panda 3', where Po must embrace his destiny and lead a new generation of warriors to victory against overwhelming odds.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Kung Fu Panda 3' is the highest-grossing animated film directed by a woman, Jennifer Yuh Nelson, who also directed the previous installment in the franchise.
The film explores themes of family, identity, and self-discovery, as Po grapples with his dual role as the Dragon Warrior and a son reconnecting with his past.

Title: Zootopia
Description: In the bustling city of Zootopia, a rookie bunny cop teams up with a cynical con artist fox to solve a mysterious case involving the disappearance of predators. As they delve deeper into the conspiracy, they uncover shocking truths that challenge their beliefs and shake the city to its core.
Director: Byron Howard, Rich Moore, Jared Bush
ProductionCompany: Walt Disney Pictures, Walt Disney Animation Studios

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Explore the vibrant metropolis of 'Zootopia', where predators and prey live side by side, and join Judy Hopps and Nick Wilde on a thrilling adventure to uncover the city's darkest secrets.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Dive into the sprawling world of 'Zootopia', a city like no other, where anyone can be anything, and experience the ultimate buddy cop comedy featuring a bunny cop and a sly fox.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Zootopia' received widespread acclaim for its richly detailed world-building, timely social commentary, and engaging storyline, winning the Academy Award for Best Animated Feature.
The film's themes of prejudice, discrimination, and tolerance resonate with audiences of all ages, sparking important conversations about diversity and inclusion.

Title: Смешарики
Description: Приключения веселых животных из Заповедника, каждый из которых обладает уникальными характеристиками и хобби. Вместе они исследуют мир, решают задачи и помогают друг другу в различных ситуациях.

MovieCards.Title: Постер
MovieCards.Description: Погрузитесь в веселый и удивительный мир 'Смешариков', где каждый персонаж уникален и интересен, а приключения никогда не заканчиваются!

MovieCards.Title: Показать время
MovieCards.Description: Присоединяйтесь к веселым животным из Заповедника в их захватывающих приключениях и невероятных историях в мультсериале 'Смешарики'!

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Смешарики' стали одним из самых популярных мультсериалов в России благодаря своему яркому и забавному стилю, а также интересным и увлекательным сюжетам.
Сериал получил признание зрителей и критиков за свой положительный вклад в детское развитие, включая обучение дружбе, сотрудничеству и решению проблем.

Title: Walking with Dinosaurs: The Movie
Quote: История о дружбе, смелости и выживании.
Description: Присоединяйтесь к Патчи Пахиринозавру в его эпическом путешествии по доисторическому миру в 'Walking with Dinosaurs: The Movie', где он узнает настоящий смысл смелости, дружбы и лидерства.

MovieCards.Title: Постер
MovieCards.Description: Пройдите по дороге в доисторическую эпоху вместе с Патчи Пахиринозавром в 'Walking with Dinosaurs: The Movie', где он учится настоящей смелости, дружбе и лидерству.

MovieCards.Title: Показать время
MovieCards.Description: Ощутите весь величественный мир мезозойской эпохи в 'Walking with Dinosaurs: The Movie', визуально захватывающее приключение, которое оживляет мир динозавров, как никогда прежде.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'Walking with Dinosaurs: The Movie' объединяет современную компьютерную анимацию с живыми съемками, чтобы создать визуально захватывающий опыт, переносящий зрителей в эпоху динозавров.
Фильм содержит образовательный аспект, в котором фактическая информация о динозаврах вплетена в повествование, предоставляя зрителям увлекательный и информативный опыт.

Title: The Mystery of the Third Planet
Quote: A delightful space adventure for the whole family.
Description: Join Alice, Captain Zelyonyy, and Professor Seleznyov as they embark on a thrilling journey through space in search of unique animals for the Moscow Zoo. Along the way, they encounter strange creatures, hostile aliens, and unexpected challenges, making for an unforgettable adventure.

MovieCards.Title: Poster
MovieCards.Description: Embark on a delightful space adventure with 'The Mystery of the Third Planet', where Alice, Captain Zelyonyy, and Professor Seleznyov journey through the cosmos in search of rare creatures for the Moscow Zoo.

MovieCards.Title: Showtime
MovieCards.Description: Join Alice and her companions on a thrilling space odyssey in 'The Mystery of the Third Planet', encountering strange aliens, solving mysteries, and discovering the wonders of the universe.

InterestingFacts.FactText: 'The Mystery of the Third Planet' is based on a novel by Kir Bulychev and is considered one of the most beloved Soviet animated films, captivating audiences with its imaginative storytelling and colorful animation.
The film received numerous awards and accolades for its creative vision and contribution to Soviet animation, becoming a cherished classic for generations of viewers.
